items.description: The UK stock market may be lacking fashionable technology shares but investors are keen to buy British next year

items.description: The ONS releases inflation data for November tomorrow (17 December). Has inflation continued its downward trend?

items.description: Healthcare and biotech stocks offer tempting valuations following years in the doldrums

items.title: How to limit how much of your Christmas bonus goes to the taxman

items.title: High earners face £15k income hit by 2029 following Autumn Budget
items.description: Rachel Reeves’s Autumn Budget means high earners – or HENRYs – are now looking at an income hit running into the thousands. Can you avoid it?
